code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Route,useLocation,withRouter}from'react-router-dom';import App from'./App';import{Login}from'./pages/Login';import{Error}from'./pages/Error';import{NotFound}from'./pages/NotFound';import{Access}from'./pages/Access';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AppWrapper=function AppWrapper(){var location=useLocation();useEffect(function(){window.scrollTo(0,0);},[location]);switch(location.pathname){case'/login':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",component:Login});case'/error':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/error",component:Error});case'/notfound':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/notfound",component:NotFound});case'/access':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/access",component:Access});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(App,{});}};export default withRouter(AppWrapper);
